video.title: El Internado
video.synopsis: When strange events begin to occur at the elite Laguna Negra boarding school, a group of students uncover dark secrets about its past.

episodes.synopsis: After escaping a psychiatric hospital, María gets a job at a boarding school where young orphans Marcos and Paula have just been enrolled.
episodes.title: Los monstruos no hacen cosquillas

episodes.synopsis: Jacinta uncovers María's secret, Victoria and Carolina investigate Alfonso's disappearance and Marcos fights back against the bullies.
episodes.title: Todo el mundo tiene un secreto

episodes.synopsis: Marcos and the kids find evidence of foul play in Alfonso's disappearance, and Héctor has trouble balancing work and his relationship with Elsa.
episodes.title: Ojos que no ven

episodes.synopsis: A reporter tells the kids of five orphans who disappeared from the school in the 1970s and warns them of the new danger they face.
episodes.title: Un mensaje en una botella

episodes.synopsis: The kids realize the reporter's story was true when his dismembered body is found in the lake; all of Jacinta's letters to Verónica are returned.
episodes.title: Un cadáver en la laguna

episodes.synopsis: With Marcos and Iván locked in Alfonso's room, Cayetano, Roque, Victoria and Carolina must venture deeper into the labyrinth on their own.
episodes.title: La noche de Santa Isabel

episodes.synopsis: The school is in shock, with one student found dead and another missing. Meanwhile, Paula faces the reality of her parents' death.
episodes.title: ¿Con qué sueñan los peces?

episodes.synopsis: The students discover that their classmate left a clue on his cell phone moments before his death; the new math teacher makes a bad first impression.
episodes.title: Persiguiendo luciérnagas

episodes.synopsis: Jacinta returns to the Black Lagoon to find that Elsa has replaced Héctor. Meanwhile, new student Julia chafes at the confinement of the school.
episodes.title: El anillo

episodes.synopsis: Elsa and Héctor plan to welcome a new baby, and as students leave for a break, Marcos stays behind to learn why Alfonso had a picture of his sister.
episodes.title: La caja de música

episodes.synopsis: A car crash kills Jacinta's daughter but spares her grandson, who comes to the school. Julia discovers that Victoria stole from Mateo's room.
episodes.title: En orden alfabético

episodes.synopsis: Iván uncovers the truth about his past, Carol's mother is rushed to the hospital, and the kids get a lead in their search for the missing girls.
episodes.title: Ver para creer

episodes.synopsis: The kids realize that Judge Saavedra has vanished, María suspects Fermín's strange behavior, and hidden truths emerge about the Black Lagoon.
episodes.title: Mi amigo el monstruo

episodes.synopsis: In light of the disappearance of the five orphans and a string of other strange events, the kids reluctantly abandon their hunt for the truth.
episodes.title: El polo norte

episodes.synopsis: Fermín disappears and is thought to have made off with a spainting. Meanwhile, the kids learn who really attacked Marcos in the tunnel.
episodes.title: El búho

episodes.synopsis: The kids discover that the painting they found is a priceless Bosch. Meanwhile, killing a man leaves Iván frantic and confused.
episodes.title: 9 milímetros

episodes.synopsis: Fermín makes an appointment with his contact, and Marcos tries to learn why his grandfather operated on students at the Black Lagoon.
episodes.title: El soldadito de plomo

episodes.synopsis: Irene is frantic when Camilo takes her baby, and Victoria learns of a student who disappeared three years earlier amid an affair with a teacher.
episodes.title: En el fondo del mar

episodes.synopsis: Paula has terrifying flashbacks of the night before, but everyone tells her it was just a nightmare. Jacinta asks Don Joaquín for financial help.
episodes.title: La vida es sueño

episodes.synopsis: Mateo catches the kids in his room as they search for proof that he's behind the events at the Black Lagoon.
episodes.title: La peor cárcel del mundo

episodes.synopsis: As María finds herself torn between love for and fear of being with Fermín, Iván tells her that his father will soon introduce him to his real mother.
episodes.title: El fantasma de la profesora decapitada

episodes.synopsis: During gym class, the kids discover an old swing set, a relic from the orphanage era, that holds a clue to Samuel Espí's fate.
episodes.title: Los cinco vengadores

episodes.synopsis: Fermín hunts for an antidote when his contact injects him with venom. Meanwhile, the Night of Bonfires offers everyone a chance to forget the past.
episodes.title: La noche del fuego

episodes.synopsis: Fermín searches for Irene Espi's baby, who may have been doomed by his mother's attempt to save him from their pursuers.
episodes.title: La maldición

episodes.synopsis: Marcos faces the difficult task of identifying his parents at the morgue, and Lucas and Martin stumble upon the secret door to the attic.
episodes.title: La sala del tesoro

episodes.synopsis: Marcos receives an ominous text message that only prompts the kids to search for its sender. Meanwhile, Iván's son believes he killed Cayetano.
episodes.title: El secreto mejor guardado

episodes.synopsis: Lucas finds his mother's phone number, but his father has forbidden him to call. Meanwhile, Héctor keeps Marcos company after a suicide attempt.
episodes.title: Premonición

episodes.synopsis: Paula and Lucas grow concerned for Evelyn, who wanders the halls during the night; Marcos watches the footage of his mother's psychology sessions.
episodes.title: El exorcismo

episodes.synopsis: Pedro is framed for poisoning the body found in Mateo's trunk. Meanwhile, Lucas has recurring nightmares of his father stabbing someone.
episodes.title: Escrito en las estrellas

episodes.synopsis: Iván signs the custody papers to prove he trusts his father but discovers he shouldn't have just moments later.
episodes.title: Un gran soldado

episodes.synopsis: Carolina believes that Amelia's hiding something, but Marcos thinks that she's just jealous. Meanwhile, Toni uncovers Fermín's art theft.
episodes.title: La llave

episodes.synopsis: Lucas tells his father about the nightmares about him stabbing someone with a screwdriver; Julia believes the key the friends found opens a safe.
episodes.title: El unicornio

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected guest disrupts Iván and Julia's evening; Héctor falls out of bed and is trapped on the floor until Jacinta finds him.
episodes.title: Un punto en el mar

episodes.synopsis: A tradition at the Night of Two Moons celebration sparks a memory of Lucas' dream, and he fears that someone will be murdered.
episodes.title: La noche de las dos lunas

episodes.synopsis: New history teacher Rebeca makes a bad first impression, Marcos' friends are lured into the woods, and the police search for Don Joaquín.
episodes.title: El cuaderno del Doctor Wulf

episodes.synopsis: Héctor's friend Hugo, the new physical education teacher, arrives, and the kids look for a safe place to store the evidence until it's time to reveal it.
episodes.title: Amnesia

episodes.synopsis: After missing three calls from his father, Marcos gets a shock when he calls back. Meanwhile, Julia is haunted by nightmares.
episodes.title: El hombre del saco

episodes.synopsis: Paula discovers Susana's body hanging in the bathroom, a storm takes out the road to the school, and Marcos and Iván search the tunnels for a coffin.
episodes.title: La novia cadáver

episodes.synopsis: Believing that Susana's death is connected to that of the ranger's nephew, the kids send a message to her family to reveal the truth to them.
episodes.title: La promesa

episodes.synopsis: Jacinta and Héctor see a video of Noiret discussing the Gemini Project, and the police investigate Samuel's drowning.
episodes.title: El vampiro

episodes.synopsis: Vicky is trapped in the tunnels and no one knows she's missing. Meanwhile, Héctor tells Jacinta that new doctor Lucía is the fourth Gemini orphan.
episodes.title: El rey de la baraja

episodes.synopsis: The teachers notice Elsa's bruised face and believe Noiret beat her. Meanwhile, Carol and Vicky ponder Nacho's last words: "One of you is a traitor."
episodes.title: Paula en el país de las maravillas

episodes.synopsis: After encountering Héctor in the tunnels, the kids search his room to find proof of his connection to the strange events at the Black Lagoon.
episodes.title: El último día

episodes.synopsis: As Marcos and his friends return to the Black Lagoon, they begin to wonder why some of them have been asked to return.
episodes.title: Los monstruos vienen de noche

episodes.synopsis: Lucía gets news that her parents have been found dead, and Evelyn is terrified by a message in a fortune cookie that says she will die.
episodes.title: Las galletas del porvenir

episodes.synopsis: The infirmary is broken into and ransacked during the night, apparently by an animal, and Fermín brings in an outside psychiatrist to examine María.
episodes.title: El hombre lobo

episodes.synopsis: When everyone becomes infected and must depend on Noiret to survive, one person turns out to be an impostor, and most suspect Carol.
episodes.title: La traición

episodes.synopsis: Noiret blackmails Iván, withholding his medicine until he reveals where María is; Rebeca tells Fermín about Ottox's experiments on the homeless.
episodes.title: El baile de los culpables

episodes.synopsis: Julia isn't sure if Paula was jumping rope in her room or if she dreamed it, and the animal stalking the school by night kills the ranger's dog.
episodes.title: Paula y el lobo

episodes.synopsis: Despite Noiret's protests, Carolina believes that one of her friends is a traitor. Meanwhile, the kids search for Eva's tomb to decode her message.
episodes.title: La leyenda de Eva

episodes.synopsis: Amaia finds Amelia lying unconscious in her room; Roque confesses to Noiret that he murdered Carolina and buried her in the woods.
episodes.title: La princesa de hielo

episodes.synopsis: Marcos and his friends are stunned when Noiret and some armed men take Carolina's body. Fermín tends to Rebeca after Hugo shoots her in the tunnels.
episodes.title: El extraterrestre

episodes.synopsis: Eva Wulf's ghost sends a message to the kids. Meanwhile, a stunned Amelia watches video of Irene Espí's sessions with a psychologist.
episodes.title: La habitación número 14

episodes.synopsis: The kids find a notebook in Eva Wulf's old room that outlines the Gemini Project's origins. Meanwhile, Hugo's twin brother is discovered in the attic.
episodes.title: El mago

episodes.synopsis: After their father warns them that there's danger at school, Marcos and Paula spend the night in the pigeon loft.
episodes.title: Alaska

episodes.synopsis: Evelyn finds a vial of Ottox virus and thinks it's a perfume sample. Meanwhile, Julia insists on bringing Eva Wulf out of her cryogenic state.
episodes.title: Después de la luz

episodes.synopsis: The army surrounds the school when the Ottox virus is unleashed, and tensions mount as it's discovered there isn't enough medicine to go around.
episodes.title: El protocolo

episodes.synopsis: As the Ottox virus outbreak expands outside the school, authorities realize that they desperately need the cache of medicine in the collapsed tunnels.
episodes.title: La amenaza

episodes.synopsis: Vicky's troubling nightmare grows more disturbing when Marcos says he had the same one the night before; Hugo and Rebeca are trapped in the tunnels.
episodes.title: El hombre misterioso

episodes.synopsis: Marcos and his friends try to track the man who appeared in their dreams, and Lucía believes that Héctor might still be alive.
episodes.title: El tesoro

episodes.synopsis: A gunshot puts Lucía in jeopardy, but the soldiers surrounding the school won't send help; Martín hides Lucas in the attic when he becomes infected.
episodes.title: El centro de la tierra

episodes.synopsis: As the Ottox virus continues to expand out of control, it becomes apparent that someone is trying to kill Hugo.
episodes.title: Los tres pétalos

episodes.synopsis: The friends finally learns that Roque was responsible for Carolina's death, and that, believing she'd died in a fall, he actually buried her alive.
episodes.title: El asesino de Carolina

episodes.synopsis: Hugo destroys the medicine supply before killing a soldier and escaping. Those left behind pin their hopes on the arrival of a radiation machine.
episodes.title: El último deseo

episodes.synopsis: María finds Rubén posing as Hugo. Later, Roque holds his friends at gunpoint and locks them in the tunnels to give himself time to escape.
episodes.title: El principio del fin

episodes.synopsis: The friends realize the grim fate that awaits them when the soldiers guarding the school capture the mystery man and place mines at the perimeter.
episodes.title: La última dosis

episodes.synopsis: Fermín is killed by a mine; Lucas dreams about Héctor but knows it can't be a premonition because Héctor is dead -- isn't he?
episodes.title: Los últimos recuerdos

episodes.synopsis: Fermín proposes to María, and the situation at the school grows more tense when Lucia sabotages an attempt to make more medicine.
episodes.title: Hasta que la muerte los separe

episodes.synopsis: Lucas confesses that he's in love with Paula during a game. Meanwhile, Fermín and Rebeca manage to sneak into the military camp.
episodes.title: El último aliento

episodes.synopsis: Paula escapes and Marcos finds her in the woods. Rendered mute at first by shock, she regains her ability to speak and shares surprising news.
episodes.title: La luz

episodes.synopsis: The students attempt to get through to the radiation machine via the tunnels, unaware that Lt. Garrido is hiding among them.
episodes.title: El fin
